comment:
* Enrollment information about the different available keyphrases.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: VOICE_KEYPHRASE_META_DATA
variables.comment: * Name under which a Hotword enrollment component publishes information about itself. * This meta-data should reference an XML resource containing a * <{@link * android.R.styleable#VoiceEnrollmentApplication * voice-enrollment-application}> tag.

variables.name: ACTION_MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRASES
variables.comment:
* Intent Action: for managing the keyphrases for hotword detection.
     * This needs to be defined by a service that supports enrolling users for hotword/keyphrase
     * detection.
     * @hide

variables.name: EXTRA_VOICE_KEYPHRASE_ACTION
variables.comment:
* Intent extra: The intent extra for the specific manage action that needs to be performed.
     *
     * @see #MANAGE_ACTION_ENROLL
     * @see #MANAGE_ACTION_RE_ENROLL
     * @see #MANAGE_ACTION_UN_ENROLL
     * @hide

variables.name: EXTRA_VOICE_KEYPHRASE_HINT_TEXT
variables.comment:
* Intent extra: The hint text to be shown on the voice keyphrase management UI.
     * @hide

variables.name: EXTRA_VOICE_KEYPHRASE_LOCALE
variables.comment:
* Intent extra: The voice locale to use while managing the keyphrase.
     * This is a BCP-47 language tag.
     * @hide

variables.name: MANAGE_ACTION_ENROLL
variables.comment: * Indicates desired action to enroll keyphrase model

variables.name: MANAGE_ACTION_RE_ENROLL
variables.comment: * Indicates desired action to re-enroll keyphrase model

variables.name: MANAGE_ACTION_UN_ENROLL
variables.comment: * Indicates desired action to un-enroll keyphrase model

variables.name: mKeyphrasePackageMap
variables.comment: * Map between KeyphraseMetadata and the package name of the enrollment app that provides it.

methods.name: private KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseMetadataFromApplicationInfo(PackageManager pm, ApplicationInfo ai, List<String> parseErrors)
private KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseFromTypedArray(TypedArray array, String packageName, List<String> parseErrors)
public Collection<KeyphraseMetadata> listKeyphraseMetadata()
methods.comment:
* @return An array of available keyphrases that can be enrolled on the system.
     *         It may be null if no keyphrases can be enrolled.

methods.name: public Intent getManageKeyphraseIntent(@ManageActions int action, @NonNull String keyphrase, @NonNull Locale locale)
methods.comment:
* Returns an intent to launch an service that manages the given keyphrase
     * for the locale.
     *
     * @param action The enrollment related action that this intent is supposed to perform.
     * @param keyphrase The keyphrase that the user needs to be enrolled to.
     * @param locale The locale for which the enrollment needs to be performed.
     * @return An {@link Intent} to manage the keyphrase. This can be null if managing the
     *         given keyphrase/locale combination isn't possible.

methods.name: public KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseMetadata(@NonNull String keyphrase, @NonNull Locale locale)
methods.comment:
* Gets the {@link KeyphraseMetadata} for the given keyphrase and locale, null if any metadata
     * isn't available for the given combination.
     *
     * @param keyphrase The keyphrase that the user needs to be enrolled to.
     * @param locale The locale for which the enrollment needs to be performed.
     *        This is a Java locale, for example "en_US".
     * @return The metadata, if the enrollment client supports the given keyphrase
     *         and locale, null otherwise.

methodNames: private KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseMetadataFromApplicationInfo(PackageManager pm, ApplicationInfo ai, List<String> parseErrors)
private KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseFromTypedArray(TypedArray array, String packageName, List<String> parseErrors)
public Intent getManageKeyphraseIntent(@ManageActions int action, @NonNull String keyphrase, @NonNull Locale locale)
public KeyphraseMetadata getKeyphraseMetadata(@NonNull String keyphrase, @NonNull Locale locale)
